title: Update Spyder info
description: This is the information required to update Spyder

env_path.description: Path to the Spyder runtime environment.

update_type.description: Type of update to be performed.

window_title.description: Title for the window that will display the UI.

scale_factor.description: Scale factor at which Spyder is displayed.

initial_message.description: Initial message to show in the UI.

success_message.description: Message to show in the UI when the update was successful.

failure_message.description: Message to show in the UI when the update failed.

error_message.description: Message to show in the UI when there was an error trying to run the update.

details_title.description: Title to show on the top of the Show details widget.

font_family.description: Font family to use in the UI.

font_size.description: Font size to use in the UI.

monospace_font_family.description: Monospace font family to use in the UI.

monospace_font_size.description: Monospace font size to use in the UI.

interface_theme.description: Interface theme to set for the UI to match the Spyder one.

icon_color.description: Color for icons in the UI.

installation_script.description: Path to the installation script (only used for testing).
